import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import "bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css" import { Container, Row, Col, Jumbotron, Form, Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; import '../css/home1.css' import Navbar from '../components/navbar.js' import Chat from './chat.js' import socket from './connect.js' function Home1(){ const [chat, setChat] = useState({ message: '', name: 'Lulu' }) const onMessageSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault() const { name, message } = chat socket.emit('message', { name, message }) setMess({ message: '', name }) } return(

Channel

{mess.name} dit :

List connected
) } export default Home1
